casebody.data:
State
v.
Darryl Anthony Howard 285P97-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 31, 2016

*794James P. Cooney, III, Attorney at Law, Charlotte.

Barry C. Scheck, Seema Saifee, Attorney at Law, for Howard, Darryl Anthony. Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of July 2014 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Ex Mero Motu, Dissolved nunc protunc by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of August 2016."
